code: import{toast}from"react-toastify";import"react-toastify/dist/ReactToastify.css";function errorResponseHandler(error){if(error){var message;if(error.response){if(error.response.status===500)message="Something went wrong";else message=error.response.data.message;console.log(message);toast(message);return Promise.reject(error);}}}export default errorResponseHandler;
